metadata.description: Azure Datacenter location for all resources
Username for the admin account of the Virtual Machines
Password for the admin account of the Virtual Machines
Size of the Virtual Machines

True enables Accelerated Networking and False disabled it.  
Not all VM sizes support Accel Net (i.e. Standard_B2ms).  
I'd recommend Standard_D2s_v3 for a cheap VM that supports Accel Net.

Storage account name restrictions:
- Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and may contain numbers and lowercase letters only.
- Your storage account name must be unique within Azure. No two storage accounts can have the same name.
VPN Shared Key used for authenticating VPN connections
Azure Datacenter that the resource is deployed to
Name of the Virtual Network

An Array of Custom DNS Server IP Addresses.  Azure Wireserver will be used if left as an empty array [].
Example:
[10.0.0.4, 10.0.0.5]
Name of the General Network Security Group
Name of the General Route Table
Azure Datacenter that the resource is deployed to
Name of the Virtual Network

An Array of Custom DNS Server IP Addresses.  Azure Wireserver will be used if left as an empty array [].
Example:
[10.0.0.4, 10.0.0.5]
Name of the General Network Security Group
Name of the General Route Table
Name of the Hub Virtual Network
Name of the Spoke Virtual Network
Azure Datacenter location that the main resouces will be deployed to.
Name of the Azure Bastion
Azure Datacenter location that the main resouces will be deployed to.
Name of the Azure Bastion
Resource ID of the subnet the Azure Bastion will be placed in.  The name of the subnet must be "AzureBastionSubnet"
SKU of the Azure Bastion
Name of the First Virtual Network
Name of the Second Virtual Network
Azure Datacenter that the resource is deployed to
Name of the Virtual Network

An Array of Custom DNS Server IP Addresses.  Azure Wireserver will be used if left as an empty array [].
Example:
[10.0.0.4, 10.0.0.5]
Name of the General Network Security Group
Name of the General Route Table
Azure Datacenter that the resources are deployed to
Name of the Azure Virtual Network Gateway
SKU of the Virtual Network Gateway

Generation of the Virtual Network Gateway SKU
Generation1: Basic, VpnGw1-3, VpnGw1-3AZ
Generation2: VpnGw2-5, VpnGw2-5Az
Virtul Network Gateway ASN for BGP
Virtual Network Resource ID
Configures the Virtual Network Gateway as Active Active with two Public IP Addresses if True.  Default is False.

variables.ipConfiguration: [if(parameters('activeActive'), createArray(createObject('name', 'vNetGatewayConfig1', 'properties', createObject('privateIPAllocationMethod', 'Dynamic', 'subnet', createObject('id', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Subnet_ResourceID')), 'publicIPAddress', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', format('{0}_PIP_01', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Name')))))), createObject('properties', createObject('name', 'vNetGatewayConfig2', 'privateIPAllocationMethod', 'Dynamic', 'subnet', createObject('id', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Subnet_ResourceID')), 'publicIPAddress', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', format('{0}_PIP_02', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Name'))))))), createArray(createObject('name', 'vNetGatewayConfig1', 'properties', createObject('privateIPAllocationMethod', 'Dynamic', 'subnet', createObject('id', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Subnet_ResourceID')), 'publicIPAddress', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', format('{0}_PIP_01', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Name'))))))))]

variables.ipConfiguration: [if(parameters('activeActive'), createArray(createObject('name', 'vNetGatewayConfig1', 'properties', createObject('privateIPAllocationMethod', 'Dynamic', 'subnet', createObject('id', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Subnet_ResourceID')), 'publicIPAddress', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', format('{0}_PIP_01', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Name')))))), createObject('properties', createObject('name', 'vNetGatewayConfig2', 'privateIPAllocationMethod', 'Dynamic', 'subnet', createObject('id', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Subnet_ResourceID')), 'publicIPAddress', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', format('{0}_PIP_02', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Name'))))))), createArray(createObject('name', 'vNetGatewayConfig1', 'properties', createObject('privateIPAllocationMethod', 'Dynamic', 'subnet', createObject('id', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Subnet_ResourceID')), 'publicIPAddress', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', format('{0}_PIP_01', parameters('virtualNetworkGateway_Name'))))))))]
